description:
A DAB/DAB+ Software Defined Radio (SDR)


Major changes since welle.io 2.6
Core
- Introduce a selector when a station is found in multiple ensembles
- Add scroll bar to station list
- Fix some graphical issues in GUI
- Update readme.md
- Minor changes
Windows
- No Windows specific changes
Linux
- Add flathub.org support (https://flathub.org/apps/io.welle.welle-gui)
  - It is recommended to install welle.io via flathub
- Add flatpack arm64 support
- Update to Qt 6.8.2
Android and macOS
- Currently unmaintained
- Please use version 2.4
